aguiaj.draw

Interface IGrid

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GridContract

    public interface IGrid
    Represents two-dimensional grids, where each position has a background color, and optionally an image.
    Author:
    Andre L. Santos

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IColor getBackground(int row, int column)
      Returns the background color at a given grid position.
      IDimension getDimension()
      The grid dimension.
      IImage getImageAt(int row, int column)
      Returns the image at a given grid position.
      int getPositionPixels()
      Number of pixels of the side length of each grid position.

    • Method Detail

      • getDimension

        IDimension getDimension()
        The grid dimension.
        Returns:
        a non-null reference

      • getPositionPixels

        int getPositionPixels()
        Number of pixels of the side length of each grid position.
        Returns:
        a positive integer

      • getBackground

        IColor getBackground(int row,
                   int column)
        Returns the background color at a given grid position. Cannot return null.
        Parameters:
        row - a valid index of the position's row according to the grid dimension
        column - a valid index of the position's column according to the grid dimension
        Returns:
        a non-null reference

      • getImageAt

        IImage getImageAt(int row,
                int column)
        Returns the image at a given grid position. May return null, meaning that there is no image at the position.
        Parameters:
        row - a valid index of the position's row according to the grid dimension
        column - a valid index of the position's column according to the grid dimension
        Returns:
        a reference to an image, or null in case there is no image at the position
